addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_Plant_Name: Please provide the name of the plant.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_Company_Code: Select the company code from the dropdown menu.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_Phone_Number: Enter the phone number of the plant.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_Ext: Provide the extension number if applicable.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_Address1: Enter the primary address of the plant.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_Address2: Enter the secondary address of the plant.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_Country: Select the country from the dropdown menu.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_State: Select the state from the dropdown menu.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_City: Select the city from the dropdown menu.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_ZipCode: Please enter the zip code of the plant location.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_Save: Click here to save the information.
addZBCPlantRate.AddZBCPlantRate_Cancel: Click here to reset the form and return to the grid page.
